dict.string: A friend of mine and I decided to build an application for the brand new iPad. As he enjoyed playing Etch-a-Sketch as child we decided to bring back some good old childhood memories. Though the application was rejected due copyright issue it was a still a great learning experience. Diving deeper in CoreGraphics and custom UIControls was a clever choice. EtchPad features two rotary knobs for vertical and horizontal line movement. There is also an undo function as well as the possibility to export and share your drawing.
EtchPad is an application designed to bring back some childhood memories.
